    • Constructor Detail

      • UserCreatorService

        public UserCreatorService()
        Initialize the service with empty properties

        This class is effectively a singleton managed by Spring, so instead of calling this constructor, the previous configuration should be overridden via method calls for adding new users.

    • Method Detail

        Parameters:

      • setInstitutionId

        public UserCreatorService setInstitutionId​(java.lang.String institutionId)
        Set the unique institution ID of this user. Not to be confused with object ID, which is generated by the database.
        Parameters:
        institutionId - The unique institution ID of the user
        Returns:
        This UserCreatorService instance for further configuration

      • create

        public User create()
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a new user based on prior configuration and inject said user into the database
        Returns:

        Throws:
